trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualItemsSelectionRangeChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualItemsSelectionRangeChanged" /> 事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualItemsSelectionRangeChanged> event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is in virtual mode, and the selection state of a range of items is changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualItemsSelectionRangeChanged>事件发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>处于虚拟模式，以及将更改的一系列项的选择状态。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualItemsSelectionRangeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualItemsSelectionRangeChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> named `ListView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>名为`ListView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualItemsSelectionRangeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualItemsSelectionRangeChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The index of the first item in the range that has changed.
trans-unit.target: 范围中更改了选择状态的第一项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the last item in the range that has changed.
trans-unit.target: 范围中更改了选择状态的最后一项的索引。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate the items are selected; <see langword="false" /> to indicate the items are deselected.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则指示已选定范围中的项；如果为 <see langword="false" />，则指示已取消选择范围中的项。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewVirtualItemsSelectionRangeChangedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewVirtualItemsSelectionRangeChangedEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewVirtualItemsSelectionRangeChangedEventArgs> occurs when items are changed from selected to deselected, and deselected to selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewVirtualItemsSelectionRangeChangedEventArgs>选择要取消选择，并取消选择为选定项从更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The `isSelected` parameter indicates the current state of the range of items.
trans-unit.target: `isSelected`参数指示的项的范围的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="startIndex" /> is larger than <paramref name="endIndex." />
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="startIndex" /> 大于 <paramref name="endIndex." />

trans-unit.source: Gets the index for the last item in the range of items whose selection state has changed
trans-unit.target: 获取范围中更改了选择状态的最后一项的索引

trans-unit.source: The index of the last item in the range of items whose selection state has changed.
trans-unit.target: 范围中更改了选择状态的最后一项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualItemsSelectionRangeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> named `ListView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>名为`ListView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualItemsSelectionRangeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.VirtualItemsSelectionRangeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the range of items is selected.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否已选定范围中的项。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the range of items is selected; <see langword="false" /> if the range of items is deselected.
trans-unit.target: 如果已选定范围中的项，则为 <see langword="true" />；如果已取消选定范围中的项，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewVirtualItemsSelectionRangeChangedEventArgs> occurs when items are changed from selected to deselected, and deselected to selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewVirtualItemsSelectionRangeChangedEventArgs>选择要取消选择，并取消选择为选定项从更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The `isSelected` parameter indicates the current state of the range of items.
trans-unit.target: `isSelected`参数指示的项的范围的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index for the first item in the range of items whose selection state has changed.
trans-unit.target: 获取范围中更改了选择状态的第一项的索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the first item in the range of items whose selection state has changed.
trans-unit.target: 范围中更改了选择状态的第一项的索引。
